Sentencas: The effects of various current collectors on the electrochemical property measurements of a Ni-YSZ cermet have been investigated.
Titulo: Electrochemical properties of Ni-YSZ cermet in solid oxide fuel cells - Effect of current collecting

Sentencas: Electrochemical characteristics were determined by impedance spectroscopy (LS) at open-circuit voltage in H(2)-H(2)O atmosphere at 800 degrees C using a symmetrical cell.
Titulo: Electrochemical properties of Ni-YSZ cermet in solid oxide fuel cells - Effect of current collecting

Sentencas: We selected various current collectors made of gold, platinum and nickel and with two different structures, paste and mesh.
Titulo: Electrochemical properties of Ni-YSZ cermet in solid oxide fuel cells - Effect of current collecting

Sentencas: When using paste, the electrochemical response, recorded with the same Ni-YSZ cermet sample, depends greatly on the nature of the current collector.
Titulo: Electrochemical properties of Ni-YSZ cermet in solid oxide fuel cells - Effect of current collecting

Sentencas: Polarization resistance values follow the order: Ni < Pt < Au.
Titulo: Electrochemical properties of Ni-YSZ cermet in solid oxide fuel cells - Effect of current collecting

Sentencas: This is the same order as reported in the literature for the hydrogen electrochemical oxidation activities of these metals.
Titulo: Electrochemical properties of Ni-YSZ cermet in solid oxide fuel cells - Effect of current collecting

Sentencas: This demonstrates that paste current collectors interfere with the electrochemical properties of the anode material.
Titulo: Electrochemical properties of Ni-YSZ cermet in solid oxide fuel cells - Effect of current collecting

Sentencas: Therefore, in order to compare the electrochemical activities of various anode materials, the same current collector has to be used.
Titulo: Electrochemical properties of Ni-YSZ cermet in solid oxide fuel cells - Effect of current collecting

Sentencas: We have also observed that the polarization resistance increases with time, due to metal particle diffusion through the Ni-YSZ cermet.
Titulo: Electrochemical properties of Ni-YSZ cermet in solid oxide fuel cells - Effect of current collecting

Sentencas: When using a nickel mesh, the electrochemical properties do not vary with time.
Titulo: Electrochemical properties of Ni-YSZ cermet in solid oxide fuel cells - Effect of current collecting

Sentencas: Moreover, the structure of this current collector is most similar to the interconnect materials, which are the current collectors in planar SOFCs.
Titulo: Electrochemical properties of Ni-YSZ cermet in solid oxide fuel cells - Effect of current collecting

Sentencas: It is, therefore, the best current collector for the study of the electrochemical properties of Ni-YSZ cermet.
Titulo: Electrochemical properties of Ni-YSZ cermet in solid oxide fuel cells - Effect of current collecting
